titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

June 19 Christmas Holiday June 24 June 24 Loving Spirit June 28 June 28 Let the People Sing July 4 July 4 Rains Came July 12 July 12 Jalna July 17 July 17 Hatler's Castle July 25 Renewed July 19 - August 19 1940 20 pd July 17 July 25 Brief Candles July 30 30 Lucy Church Aimiably Aug 2 Aug 2 Passage to India Aug 7 7 Joyful Delaneys Aug 14 14 White Peacock Aug 21 21 Merry Go-Round Aug 27 27 Jeremy at Crale Sept 2 Aug 19 - Sept 19, 1940 Renewal - R.C. pd Aug 21 20
